column4: Description
Beautiful homepage with IGNITE branding and navigation
Browse all active IGNITE events and their details
Register your team for an event with project details
Access your team's dashboard using a unique team code
View accommodation options and manage bookings
Announcements and bus schedules for volunteers
One-click login using Google account
Different access levels for admins and committee and jury
Auto-detects the main admin by email
Unauthorized users are redirected to sign-in
Overview of all events with quick stats
Set up a new IGNITE event with date and venue and settings
Toggle registration open/close and evaluation on/off
Add people to Registration or Food or Logistics or Jury committees
View all users and promote to admin or remove users
Add users by email without them needing to sign up first
Submit team name and project name and all member details
Each team gets a unique 6-digit code to access their portal
View and edit team info and member details and preferences
Team members can mark if they are attending or not
Each member can choose Veg or Non-Veg
Select accommodation type and dates needed
Teams can still update preferences after being approved
Registration committee can see all team submissions
Committee can approve or reject team registrations
Food coupons are automatically created when a team is approved
Manage all jury-related activities for an event
Add questions with score ranges for jury to grade
Modify evaluation criteria anytime
Assign which jury member evaluates which team
Jury members see their assigned teams and score them
Jury submits scores for each question per team
Lock evaluations to prevent further changes
See how many evaluations are complete vs pending
View all coupons and their usage stats
Scan or enter coupon codes to mark meals as used
Manually mark a coupon as redeemed
See how many lunch/tea/dinner/kit coupons are used vs available
Overview of all food-related data for the event
See total counts of dietary preferences
Track coupon usage per meal type
Admin view of all accommodation requests
See how many people need rooms on each date
Breakdown by accommodation type (hostel or hotel etc)
View all event announcements sorted by priority
Committee members can post announcements
Remove outdated announcements
Filter announcements by type (general or food or logistics etc)
View transport info for the event
Display bus routes and timings and stops
Download all team details as Excel file
Download food preference data as Excel
Download coupon usage report as Excel
Download accommodation requests as Excel
Download jury scores and results as Excel
Download meal attendance records as Excel
Committee members automatically routed to their event dashboards
Bulk import teams via Excel/CSV file upload
Access team portal using team lead phone number
Teams must sign in with Google before registration
Download all event data in one ZIP file
